title: Phoenix Anivia, 1350 RP skin
body:
"Phoenix Anivia is just a placeholder name, because I can't really think of a decent name, so it's not intentionally trying to be similar to Dota 2 or sound like Phoenix Cryophoeninx" Don't forget to upvote the thread if you like the skin idea! That's how it gets noticed :3

I'm glad this wasn't already made a few years ago, solely because the art and design of the last year has gone up amazingly, don't you agree? There's been a lot of effort and it's because they've gotten new members, and the older members have gotten better. There's some pretty amazing fan art, but it's hard to find, but search it up, some of it is just ridiculous! On another note, the reason why I said I'm glad it wasn't made before is because, y'know, Molten Rammus skin isn't the prettiest creation, i'll say that now.

But seriously, It'd be a really amazing looking skin if they put a lot of effort into it, and I'm pretty sure that it would bought up by any anivia player, but maybe I'm wrong. After all, it'll be her first reverse skin, and those are almost always popular!

But yeah, 1350 RP skin or another legendary, but I'm kind of worried about suggesting it as a legendary, simply because there's already Blackfrost, but the thing is, Phoenix Anivia would have to be a high quality in-game skin and splash art, else they'd be dropping off 60% of the point of it in the trash. I'd really like to have her ultimate to have more of an actual solid feel with this skin, instead of her other skins where it's almost like a mesh, even if it isn't, maybe it could be a fire/ash storm from a volcano? There's a lot to think about, but maybe we could have some references in her jokes and such?

The neat thing with this is that it could be an ultimate skin, but it all depends on the amount of work that's decided to be put into it. Her abilities, especially her ultimate, could have more visual effects and solidity, so the ground could actually burn up or look more realistic compared to what her normal ultimate is, same with her other abilities, her Wall could become molten if we'd like it, or it could just be a burning fire across the ground, who knows? 

There's a lot that could happen, suggest stuff, that's how things are made!
Also, with the possibility of the voice over, there could be additional special interactions between other members of the freljord and such.

P.S. Thanks for the support so far, the thread is already pretty popular and it hasn't even been a day! Don't forget, I only put the details that I'd like in, so keep suggesting details in the comments, like what her voice should sound like, etc!

replies.body:
Her skills do not match the theme of fire. It's called flast FROST, FROSTbite, crystalline, and GLACIER storm.
It'll look cool but it'd be a bit awkward to work with

AKA Moltres.

On a more serious note this skin idea is a awesome idea.

Magmanivia :P

YAAASSS
I believe what you're looking for is, Pyro Pheonix.
she already has a legendary skin

You forget that a champ is not limited to just one Legendary skin. Yes, we only have one champ so far that has two legendary skins ({{champion:31}}), but that doesn't mean other champs can have more then one.

> [{quoted}](name=DWT12345,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oLxPtybz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-11T05:25:52.182+0000)
>
> she already has a legendary skin

A 1350 skin isn't a legendary skin, besides, I already own her legendary and it's a good skin, but it's still ice, ice, and more ice. Besides, Veigar has a legendary skin and 6-7 others, and it's the same with other champions too! 

I said high quality, so I put the price to match, because there's a lot of potential with the skin to be one of the prettiest in the game, just my opinion.
Beautiful artwork. Sound idea. Now it's up to Riot I suppose. I do believe she's overdue for a skin, but not as much as some other champions.

> [{quoted}](name=Tsar of Death,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oLxPtybz,comment-id=0021,timestamp=2015-01-12T07:53:40.763+0000)

yeah, I'm just worried because her effects aren't amazing in any of her skins, her actual body and such are really good, but it's just there's no decent effects, and the effects are going to be key for this skin to work :o

I'm not sure, I still need more ideas, but people don't seem to comment any, makes me sad :C
But yeah, I kind of wish some reds would comment some of their opinions if they checked x)
I don't mean to dissuade you, but has Riot ever made any champions/skins that have appeared in this forum?

In the beta forums? I'm not sure, to be honest. They're not that old though, six months at most? But it won't dissuade me, just because I know it's a good skin. Heck, I can get lucky, and if there's enough support from others, the skin is bound to be noticed by at least one red, right? :s Maybe?
If the AVERAGE Blackfrost skin is legendary quality according to Riot, Phoenix will end up being ultimate.
Thats bad ass splash art, i wish i liked eggnivia enough to play her and buy  skin, lol :P
On another note, I still do want a new voice over, but I have NO idea what she should sound like, so if possible, any suggestions would help guys!
She should sound warm, and should crackle a lot. To be fair, her VO now is warm.

> [{quoted}](name=epicz753,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oLxPtybz,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2015-01-11T07:02:56.173+0000)

Yeah, that could work! Also, just my opinion, but should this skin get maybe special interaction between say her and Lissandra? I think it'd be cool
Don't forget brand!

> "Skin name is probably going to change, it's more of a placeholder, but I don't really want people screaming that's not original or Dota 2 copy, like, It's a phoenix, pls."

You literally can't copy anything from Dota because (almost) nothing in Dota is original. They are all literally direct copies of mythological creatures.

> [{quoted}](name=Sleeper Cell,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oLxPtybz,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2015-01-11T17:30:03.985+0000)
>
> You literally can't copy anything from Dota because (almost) nothing in Dota is original. They are all literally direct copies of mythological creatures.

Yeah, that was kind of my point previously, but people still tend to get a little spazzy either way, oh wellz

What about:

Earthshaker (maybe a gnoll-ish thing, vaguely?)
Bristleback (he's a friggin porcupine. You know any mythological porcupines?)
Phantom Lancer (a soldier who was imbued with magic after killing a sorcerer)
Razor (same theme as Thresh)
Clinkz (sneaky skeleton archer who sets stuff on fire)
Weaver (slippery bug-thing, protects the fabric of reality)
Puck (baby dragon?)
Rubick (spell-stealing magus)
Bane (a Nightmare. Think Nocturne.)
Dark Seer (a tactician from another world)
Batrider (self-explanatory)
Outworld Devourer (a sentry and a harbinger of doom)
Visage (a reaper. reclaims souls who flee Death.)
Meepo (scavenger/hermit)
Dragon Knight (a dragonslayer granted power by one of his foes)
Clockwerk (a gnome with clockwork armor)
Omniknight (a paladin who fights with renewed vigor after meeting his god)
Pudge (cleans the wreckage of an endless battle)
Sand King (giant scorpion)


...now that I actually think about it, a lot of these are either "monster from beyond the universe" or "guy who got magic from killing X."

> You literally can't copy anything from Dota because **(almost)** nothing in Dota is original. They are all literally direct copies of mythological creatures.

> ***ALMOST***

I thought that would dissuade anyone from posting something dumb about what's unique in Dota.

I was wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=Sleeper Cell,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oLxPtybz,comment-id=001300010001,timestamp=2015-01-12T01:14:13.831+0000)
>
> I thought that would dissuade anyone from posting something dumb about what's unique in Dota.
> 
> I was wrong.

Yeah, but it's not an offensive thread though, which is nice, right ;? But yeah, I kind of wish that we could keep the games a bit separated more often, they're both a different game, even though they both originate from the Original DOTA, which was an awesome game. But yeah, I'm not really surprised that it was defended. Oh well, we can rename the skin in a day or two if I get some good suggestions, then we won't have to worry about that C:
I would buy this champ just for this skin prob. If that was the splash art that is, very nice.

I...don't know. Like it seems like a cool idea and super easy to do but I just feel like it'd kinda take away from anivia more than it'd add. "Hey you know the cryophoenix? Well now he's a PHOENIX phoenix!"

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainMårvelous,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oLxPtybz,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-01-11T08:17:48.333+0000)
>
> I...don't know. Like it seems like a cool idea and super easy to do but I just feel like it'd kinda take away from anivia more than it'd add. "Hey you know the cryophoenix? Well now he's a PHOENIX phoenix!"

Brand "Hey, you know the Burning Vengeance? Yeah, now his fire is cold." 
I get what you mean, but it doesn't need to be called Phoenix, I put in the title that the name was subject to change :/
There's a lot of names it could be, but you can't go through the logic and then leave twenty other skins out. Also, Anivia is female :o 

But I really would like this skin, because since the subject is somewhat vague, there's a lot of ways to approach it, and there's special things we can do with this skin simply because the base of this IS fire, that means we can add onto the fire, add visual effects to what it is, change her VO, add special interactions, new taunts, and so on.
I think it'd be a worthy Legendary but probably not an Ultimate.

> [{quoted}](name=Solis Deus,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oLxPtybz,comment-id=001b,timestamp=2015-01-11T22:57:36.874+0000)
>
> I think it'd be a worthy Legendary but probably not an Ultimate.

Why not? To be honest, the only thing that makes ultimate better is that there's more work put into their special effects in my opinion, and that's kind of the majority of what I'd like for this skin. Another legendary is fine though, it's okay if it's not an ultimate :) even a 1350 skin would be okay
would love this skin anivia mains need something this awesome
This is pretty much the peperoni pizza pocket of skins, it seems so obvious it makes you wonder why it wasn't already a thing

10/10 would buy

I was slightly disappointed that anivia's legendary skin wasn't fire pheonix anivia. I still bought blackfrost because I main anivia, but I was definitely disappointed by their choice.  The retcon of Anivia's lore for the freljord event was also pretty disappointing. 

She was the God of a distant ice planet. Now she is just some ice monster that lives in the Freljord.

> [{quoted}](name=Ashes Arise,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oLxPtybz,comment-id=0023,timestamp=2015-01-12T19:51:04.247+0000)

> 
> She was the God of a distant ice planet. Now she is just some ice monster that lives in the Freljord.

I'd have to agree with you, I didn't really expect them to go the evil route for Anivia on her legendary skin, but I think the worst part of it for me is that there's almost no decent special effects on it :s, like her ultimate is worse then the base. I understand Anivia would be harder making skins for because of all her separate pieces and what not, but I still would have preferred if they took a bit longer.
